TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CorrelationHandle extends System.Activities.Handle

summary.span: Associa as atividades em uma correlação representando uma compartilhada específica ou um contexto transitório no fluxo de trabalho.

span.span: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared or transient context in the workflow.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows Workflow Foundation (WF) fornece quatro tipos de correlação: [com base em conteúdo](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [solicitação-resposta](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [Duplex durável](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), e [intercâmbio de contexto ](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).Windows Workflow Foundation (WF) provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [Request-Reply](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [Durable Duplex](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), and [Context Exchange](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md). Para obter mais informações sobre a correlação, consulte [visão geral de correlação](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), os tipos de correlação específica mencionado anteriormente, e os exemplos de correlação localizados no [serviços [WF exemplos] ](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) nó dos exemplos de WF.For more information about correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) node of the WF samples. O tempo de execução usa a para correlação se ele estiver presente, caso contrário, o **CorrelatesWith** propriedade da atividade de mensagens será usada.The runtime uses the for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used. Se ambos estiverem ausentes, o identificador de ambiente fornecido pelo ou o serviço de fluxo de trabalho é usado.If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by or the workflow service is used. ## Examples O exemplo a seguir mostra como definir o em um atividade.The following example shows how to set the on a activity. [!code-csharp[ImplicitExplicitCorrelation#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/implicitexplicitcorrelation/cs/service/pharmacyservice.cs#0)]
